item.title: The Travel Salesman Problem (TSP)
item.description: The Travel Salesman Problem (TSP) There are two versions of the TSP math formulation based in MIP, the Simetric and asimetric. The simetric case, where $c_{ij}=0$ for all $i\geq j$, is NP-complete (Laporte1992b) However, the asimetric case is NP-hard. item.title: Parallelism basics
item.description: Basic concepts in parallelism with Julia Julia coroutines Commonly known as symetric coroutines, lightweight threads, cooperative multitasking, or one-shot continuations. Julia executes scheduled tasks, can stop a task, executes a new one and then, after finish it, resumes the former one. First-in first-out queue concept.
